Elliot.line: Did you know about Tom's ambition to, uh, â€˜beat' you?

Santos.line: Hah! If I know it, mate? I can't remember the last time he hasn't told me some'ing like that!
Bother me? Hah! It's great that he wants to fly above his pa! In fact, I encourage it. It's just a shame that he doesn't have the capability to do that yet.
